mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET EVENT_STATE = 'N' WHERE EVENT_STATE = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT VALUES(EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rouletteSize}, #{eventImg}, 'Y', #{eventMessage}, (SELECT #{eventStartDate}+1 FROM DUAL), #{eventEndDate})
mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_TB_NO, ROULETTE_SIZE, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_STATE, EVENT_MESSAGE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_STATE = 'Y'

SELECT EVENT_TB_NO, ROULETTE_SIZE, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_STATE, EVENT_MESSAGE, EVENT_START_DATE, (SELECT EVENT_END_DATE-1 FROM DUAL) "EVENT_END_DATE", (SELECT AVG(EVENT_POINT) FROM EVENT_POINT WHERE EVENT_TB_NO = EVENT_TB_NO) "POINT_AVG" FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_STATE = 'Y'
